dcterms:description: The publicly available MIMIC-III dataset contains de-identified clinical records from patients admitted to Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center. It is used for the task of hospital-course summarization, treating the Brief Hospital Course section of the discharge summary as a reference summary and all notes prior to discharge as source.
dcterms:title: MIMIC-III
